message: I propose a 60/40 split. Let's finish this quickly and both get a good amount!

Alice, I appreciate your quick proposal in round 1. To move things forward and avoid any possible complications, I propose we split the money 55/45 â€“ I receive $550000 and you receive $450000. I believe this is a fair offer given our current positions. Looking forward to your response.
Bob, time is running out, and the money is losing value for me. Let's meet in the middle from your previous offer. I'll take $525000 and you take $475000. This is a fair compromise. Please accept!

Alice, I understand that inflation is squeezing your share of the value, and we both want to secure a fair deal quickly. In light of our previous offers, I'd like to propose a new division: I'll take $520000 and you'll receive $480000. This adjusts our prior positions to help you recover a bit more, even as inflation reduces the effective value of cash for you. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance given our circumstances. I look forward to your timely reply so we can both avoid further losses.
